translated: It does not occur in that way.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa lus kyi nang du byung ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa lus kyi nang du byung ba ste /
translated: It arises from concentration, and it occurs within the body,

original: phyi rol du byung ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: phyi rol du byung ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: not outside the body.

original: lus kyi bde ba lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i tshor ba'i bde ba ni ting nge 'dzin dang mthun pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin nyams par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: lus kyi bde ba lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i tshor ba'i bde ba ni ting nge 'dzin dang mthun pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin nyams par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The pleasure of the body is the pleasure associated with the consciousness of the body. It does not cause the deterioration of concentration because it is in conformity with concentration.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it does not.

original: de nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi phyir lus kyi rnam par shes pa skyes pa'i tshe @294a * //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi phyir lus kyi rnam par shes pa skyes pa'i tshe @294a * //
translated: Because of that, when the consciousness of the body arises,

original: ldang bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ldang bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: it does not cause one to arise from concentration.

original: ting nge 'dzin dang mthun pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin dang mthun pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Because it is in conformity with concentration.

original: de mngon du gyur ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin nye bar gnas so snyam du bsams pa yin no //
analyzed: de mngon du gyur ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin nye bar gnas so snyam du bsams pa yin no //
translated: It is thought that immediately after it manifests, concentration is present.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lus kyi rnam par shes pas gzugs na spyod pa'i reg bya mi 'dzin pa'i phyir lus kyi rnam par shes pa de ni gzugs na spyod pa kho na yin gyi 'dod pa na spyod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lus kyi rnam par shes pas gzugs na spyod pa'i reg bya mi 'dzin pa'i phyir lus kyi rnam par shes pa de ni gzugs na spyod pa kho na yin gyi 'dod pa na spyod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: That consciousness of the body is only of the form realm, not of the desire realm, because the consciousness of the body of the desire realm does not apprehend the tactile objects of the form realm.

original: de nyid kyi phyir de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i bde ba ni bsam gtan gyi yan lag tu mi 'grub bo zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i bde ba ni bsam gtan gyi yan lag tu mi 'grub bo zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the pleasure concomitant with that is not established as a branch of absorption.🔽Because the consciousness of pliancy arises.

original: shin tu sbyangs pa'i rnam par shes pa skyes pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa'i sgo nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lus kyi dbang pos gzugs na spyod pa 'dzin te mnyam par gzhag pa'i lus kyi dbang po gang yin pa
analyzed: shin tu sbyangs pa'i rnam par shes pa skyes pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pa'i sgo nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lus kyi dbang pos gzugs na spyod pa 'dzin te mnyam par gzhag pa'i lus kyi dbang po gang yin pa
translated: Through the power of concentration, the body faculty of the desire realm is held by the body faculty of the form realm.

original: de ni sa gong ma pa'i lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rten du 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs der 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de ni sa gong ma pa'i lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rten du 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs der 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: That is the state in which the body faculty of equipoise becomes the basis of the body consciousness of the higher realm.🔽They also become uncontaminated.

original: zag pa med pa dag tu yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni shin tu sbyangs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi reg bya dang de la dmigs pa lus kyi rnam par shes pa ste /
analyzed: zag pa med pa dag tu yang 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni shin tu sbyangs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi reg bya dang de la dmigs pa lus kyi rnam par shes pa ste /
translated: The tactile objects and body consciousness that are characterized by pliancy and focus on that are also uncontaminated.

original: reg bya dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa de dag zag pa med par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: reg bya dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa de dag zag pa med par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Tactile objects and body consciousness become uncontaminated.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: yan lag cung zad cig ni zag pa dang bcas pa cung zad cig ni zag pa med pa yin na mi rung pas zhes bya pa smos te /
analyzed: yan lag cung zad cig ni zag pa dang bcas pa cung zad cig ni zag pa med pa yin na mi rung pas zhes bya pa smos te /
translated: It is not suitable for some aspects to be contaminated and some aspects to be uncontaminated.

original: gal te de snyam du sems na /🔽lus kyi shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu gsungs pas 'dod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /🔽lus shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag mngon par shes pa dang / rdzogs par byang chub pa dang mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa dang / sems shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag mngon par shes pa dang /
analyzed: gal te de snyam du sems na / lus kyi shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu gsungs pas 'dod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te / lus shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag mngon par shes pa dang / rdzogs par byang chub pa dang mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa dang / sems shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag mngon par shes pa dang /
translated: If you think that,🔽then it is said that physical pliancy is asserted to be a branch of enlightenment because it is said that physical pliancy is a branch of enlightenment.

original: rdzogs par byang chub pa dang mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdzogs par byang chub pa dang mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: It is said that physical pliancy is a branch of enlightenment that is a superknowledge, complete enlightenment and nirvana and mental pliancy is a branch of enlightenment that is a superknowledge, complete enlightenment and nirvana.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag nyid du 'byung ba'i phyir reg bya dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa dag zag pa med par 'dod do //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag nyid du 'byung ba'i phyir reg bya dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa dag zag pa med par 'dod do //
translated: because they are included among the limbs of enlightenment.🔽If you say: “because they are compatible with the limbs of enlightenment,”

original: gal te byang chub kyi yan lag dang mthun pa'i phyir ro zhe na zhes bya ba ni ji ste 'di skad du gang gi phyir lus shin tu sbyangs pa byang chub kyi yan lag dang mthun pa de'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag ces nye bar 'dogs kyi
analyzed: gal te byang chub kyi yan lag dang mthun pa'i phyir ro zhe na zhes bya ba ni ji ste 'di skad du gang gi phyir lus shin tu sbyangs pa byang chub kyi yan lag dang mthun pa de'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag ces nye bar 'dogs kyi
translated: if you reply: “because physical pliancy is compatible with the limbs of enlightenment, it is designated as a limb of enlightenment,

original: de byang chub kyi yan lag ni ma yin no zhes lan 'debs par byed na /
analyzed: de byang chub kyi yan lag ni ma yin no zhes lan 'debs par byed na /
translated: but it is not a limb of enlightenment,”

original: @294b zag pa med pa nyid kyang de dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: @294b zag pa med pa nyid kyang de dang 'dra ste /
translated: then uncontaminated status would be similar to that.

original: reg bya dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa de dag ni zag pa med pa dang mthun pa'i phyir zag pa med pa zhes nye bar 'dogs kyi /
analyzed: reg bya dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa de dag ni zag pa med pa dang mthun pa'i phyir zag pa med pa zhes nye bar 'dogs kyi /
translated: Because contact and body consciousness are compatible with the uncontaminated, they are designated as uncontaminated,🔽but they are not uncontaminated.

original: zag pa med pa nyid ni ma yin pas de ltar na 'di dag zag pa med pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: zag pa med pa nyid ni ma yin pas de ltar na 'di dag zag pa med pa nyid yin no //
translated: Thus they are uncontaminated.

original: gal te zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni gal te zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na /🔽mig ji snyed pa dang / gzugs rnams ji snyed pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa gzhan ji snyed pa dang / lus ji snyed pa dang / reg bya rnams ji snyed pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnams ji snyed pa'o zhes 'byung ba'i mdo 'di dang 'gal lo zhes de snyam du sems na ma yin te /
analyzed: gal te zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni gal te zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na / mig ji snyed pa dang / gzugs rnams ji snyed pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa gzhan ji snyed pa dang / lus ji snyed pa dang / reg bya rnams ji snyed pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnams ji snyed pa'o zhes 'byung ba'i mdo 'di dang 'gal lo zhes de snyam du sems na ma yin te /
translated: If you think that this contradicts the sutra that states,🔽The eye, as many as there are, and forms, as many as there are, and as many as there are other eye consciousnesses, and the body, as many as there are, and tactile objects, as many as there are, and as many as there are body consciousnesses,

original: reg bya dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa gzhan las dgongs te gsungs pa'i phyir shin tu sbyangs pa de la ma gtogs pa'i reg bya rnams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa de la ma gtogs pa'i lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnams las dgongs te gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: reg bya dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa gzhan las dgongs te gsungs pa'i phyir shin tu sbyangs pa de la ma gtogs pa'i reg bya rnams dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa de la ma gtogs pa'i lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnams las dgongs te gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: then it does not, because it is stated from the perspective of tactile objects and body consciousness other than pliancy and body consciousness.

original: gal te zag pa med pa la zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni zag pa med pa ste /
analyzed: gal te zag pa med pa la zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni zag pa med pa ste /
translated: If you think that the fault of the simultaneous arising of contaminated and uncontaminated states would occur because the uncontaminated states are not established as contaminated, then Nāgārjuna explains:🔽What fault is there if they do not arise simultaneously?🔽When uncontaminated states arise, contaminated states do not arise.

original: zag pa med pa rnam par gzhag pa la yan lag cung zad cig ni zag pa dang bcas pa cung zad cig ni zag pa med par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhes bya ba ni gal te reg bya dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni zag pa
analyzed: zag pa med pa rnam par gzhag pa la yan lag cung zad cig ni zag pa dang bcas pa cung zad cig ni zag pa med par 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhes bya ba ni gal te reg bya dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni zag pa
translated: When contaminated states arise, uncontaminated states do not arise.

original: dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir la /🔽de dag las gzhan pa ni zag pa med pa yin pa'i phyir nyes pa der 'gyur ro snyam du sems na /
analyzed: dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir la / de dag las gzhan pa ni zag pa med pa yin pa'i phyir nyes pa der 'gyur ro snyam du sems na /
translated: Therefore there is no fault.

original: 'dir cig car ma yin pa'i phyir nyes pa ci zhig yod ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: 'dir cig car ma yin pa'i phyir nyes pa ci zhig yod ces bya ba smos te /
translated: If you think that the fault of the simultaneous arising of contaminated and uncontaminated states would occur because uncontaminated states are not established as contaminated, then what fault is there if they do not arise simultaneously?

original: gang gi tshe zag pa med pa'i yan lag kun du 'byung ba de'i tshe zag pa dang bcas pa kun du mi 'byung la /
analyzed: gang gi tshe zag pa med pa'i yan lag kun du 'byung ba de'i tshe zag pa dang bcas pa kun du mi 'byung la /
translated: When uncontaminated states arise, contaminated states do not arise.

original: gang gi tshe zag pa dang bcas pa kun du 'byung ba de'i tshe zag pa med pa kun du mi 'byung bas de ni nyes pa med do //
analyzed: gang gi tshe zag pa dang bcas pa kun du 'byung ba de'i tshe zag pa med pa kun du mi 'byung bas de ni nyes pa med do //
translated: When contaminated states arise, uncontaminated states do not arise. Therefore there is no fault.

original: gal te bde ba dang dga' ba phrad pa med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gal te bde ba dang dga' ba phrad pa med pa'i phyir te /
translated: If you think that because pleasure and joy do not meet,

original: lus kyi bde ba dang sems kyi dga' ba phrad pa med cing cig car ma yin pa'i phyir bsam gtan dang po yan lag lnga par mi 'gyur ro zhe na zhes bya ba ni gal te de snyam du sems na /
analyzed: lus kyi bde ba dang sems kyi dga' ba phrad pa med cing cig car ma yin pa'i phyir bsam gtan dang po yan lag lnga par mi 'gyur ro zhe na zhes bya ba ni gal te de snyam du sems na /
translated: the first absorption would not have five branches because physical pleasure and mental joy do not meet and are not simultaneous,

original: de ni nyes pa med do //
analyzed: de ni nyes pa med do //
translated: that is not a fault.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: srid pa'i phyir bstan pas rtog pa dang dpyod pa bzhin no //
analyzed: srid pa'i phyir bstan pas rtog pa dang dpyod pa bzhin no //
translated: Because they are taught to exist, like investigation and analysis.🔽Just as the first absorption is said to possess investigation and analysis,

original: ji ltar bsam gtan dang po rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas zhes bya ba rtog pa dang dpyod @295a * //
analyzed: ji ltar bsam gtan dang po rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas zhes bya ba rtog pa dang dpyod @295a * //
translated: investigation and analysis occur there by way of enumeration.

original: pa dag rnam grangs kyis 'byung ba ltar bde ba dang dga' ba dag kyang de dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: pa dag rnam grangs kyis 'byung ba ltar bde ba dang dga' ba dag kyang de dang 'dra ste /
translated: Similarly, pleasure and joy also exist there by way of enumeration.

original: srid pa'i phyir bstan pas de ni nyes pa med do //
analyzed: srid pa'i phyir bstan pas de ni nyes pa med do //
translated: Because they are taught to exist, that is not a fault.

original: gal te bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhe na zhes bya ba ni rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag rnam grangs kyis 'byung ngo zhes bya ba bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhe na smras pa /
analyzed: gal te bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhe na zhes bya ba ni rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag rnam grangs kyis 'byung ngo zhes bya ba bsgrub par bya ba yin no zhe na smras pa /
translated: If you say that it is to be established,🔽then it is established that investigation and analysis occur serially.

original: sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: sgrub pa yin no //
translated: If you say that it is to be established that investigation and analysis occur serially, then it is established that they are contradictory.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag 'gal ba'i phyir zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag 'gal ba'i phyir zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Because investigation and analysis are contradictory.

original: gang gi tshe sems rtsing ba de'i tshe zhib pa nyid med la /
analyzed: gang gi tshe sems rtsing ba de'i tshe zhib pa nyid med la /
translated: When the mind is coarse, it is not subtle.

original: gang gi tshe zhib pa nyid de'i tshe rtsing ba nyid med pas 'gal ba'i phyir rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag cig car ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe zhib pa nyid de'i tshe rtsing ba nyid med pas 'gal ba'i phyir rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag cig car ma yin no //
translated: When it is subtle, it is not coarse. Therefore, because they are contradictory, investigation and analysis do not occur simultaneously.

original: nyes pa smos pa'i phyir zhes smos pa ni rtsing ba dang zhib pa nyid sa dang rnam pa'i bye brag gis ltos pa can yin na ni srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar la rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag yod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin
analyzed: nyes pa smos pa'i phyir zhes smos pa ni rtsing ba dang zhib pa nyid sa dang rnam pa'i bye brag gis ltos pa can yin na ni srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar la rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag yod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin
translated: The phrase “because of the fault” refers to the fault that if coarseness and subtlety are differentiated by level and aspect, then investigation and analysis would exist up to the summit of existence and so on.

original: no // kha cig ni nyes pa ma smos pa'i phyir zhes 'don te /
analyzed: no // kha cig ni nyes pa ma smos pa'i phyir zhes 'don te /
translated: Some read “because no fault is mentioned,”

original: phrad pa med pa la nyes pa 'ga' yang ma smos so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: phrad pa med pa la nyes pa 'ga' yang ma smos so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: meaning that no fault is mentioned in the absence of contact.

original: yan lag gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi bor nas zhes bya ba ni yan lag gnyis bor nas bsam gtan gnyis pa rnam par gzhag ste /
analyzed: yan lag gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi bor nas zhes bya ba ni yan lag gnyis bor nas bsam gtan gnyis pa rnam par gzhag ste /
translated: The second, third, and fourth absorptions are posited by eliminating two, three, and four branches, respectively.

original: de na rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag med pa'i phyir ro //🔽yan lag gsum bor nas bsam gtan gsum pa rnam par gzhag ste /
analyzed: de na rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag med pa'i phyir ro // yan lag gsum bor nas bsam gtan gsum pa rnam par gzhag ste /
translated: The second absorption is posited by eliminating two branches because investigation and analysis do not exist there.

original: de na dga' ba yang med pas so //🔽yan lag bzhi bor nas bsam gtan bzhi pa rnam par gzhag ste /
analyzed: de na dga' ba yang med pas so // yan lag bzhi bor nas bsam gtan bzhi pa rnam par gzhag ste /
translated: The third absorption is posited by eliminating three branches because joy does not exist there.

original: de ni bde ba yang med do //
analyzed: de ni bde ba yang med do //
translated: The fourth absorption is posited by eliminating four branches because pleasure does not exist there.

original: 'du shes la sogs pa ni yan lag nyid du bshad pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni don 'du shes la sogs pa ni bsam gtan gzhan dag la bor ba med pas so //
analyzed: 'du shes la sogs pa ni yan lag nyid du bshad pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni don 'du shes la sogs pa ni bsam gtan gzhan dag la bor ba med pas so //
translated: It is explained that discernment and so on are not branches because discernment and so on are not eliminated in other absorptions.

original: yang na ci'i phyir lnga kho na yan lag nyid yin zhes bya ba ni gal te don 'di yin par mi dgongs na'o //
analyzed: yang na ci'i phyir lnga kho na yan lag nyid yin zhes bya ba ni gal te don 'di yin par mi dgongs na'o //
translated: Or else, why are only five members limbs?

original: gal te phan pa'i phyir lnga kho na yan lag nyid yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te phan pa'i phyir lnga kho na yan lag nyid yin no zhe na /
translated: If this is not the intended meaning, then if it is because they are helpful, only five are limbs.

original: de ni ma yin te rtog pa dang dpyod pa gnyis pas dran pa dang shes rab dag ches phan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni ma yin te rtog pa dang dpyod pa gnyis pas dran pa dang shes rab dag ches phan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is not so, because mindfulness and wisdom are more helpful than both applied thought and sustained thought.

original: ji ltar dran pa dang shes rab dag phan par 'dod pa de ltar rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag ni ches phan pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar dran pa dang shes rab dag phan par 'dod pa de ltar rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag ni ches phan pa ma yin te /
translated: Just as mindfulness and wisdom are considered helpful, applied thought and sustained thought are not more helpful.

original: dran pa nye bar gnas pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes pa la zhum pa dang rgod pa la sogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gnas pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes pa la zhum pa dang rgod pa la sogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because when mindfulness is present, one knows things as they really are, and there is no slackness or agitation, etc.🔽Therefore, this should be investigated.

original: de lta bas na 'di ni dpyad par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba ni 'di ni rnal 'byor @295b spyod pa'i sa mthong bas dpyod par bya ba yin no zhes slob dpon gyis der blta bar khungs 'byin pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na 'di ni dpyad par bya ba yin no zhes bya ba ni 'di ni rnal 'byor @295b spyod pa'i sa mthong bas dpyod par bya ba yin no zhes slob dpon gyis der blta bar khungs 'byin pa yin no //
translated: The Master cites this as a source for the investigation of the Bodhisattvabhumi.

original: de la bsdus pa'i don ni 'di yin par blta ste /
analyzed: de la bsdus pa'i don ni 'di yin par blta ste /
translated: The condensed meaning of this is to be seen as follows:

original: chos gzhan dag yod bzhin du ci'i dbang du byas nas rtog pa la sogs pa kho na yan lag nyid du rnam par gzhag ce na de tsam gyis gnyen po dang / phan yon dang / de gnyi ga'i rten gyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos gzhan dag yod bzhin du ci'i dbang du byas nas rtog pa la sogs pa kho na yan lag nyid du rnam par gzhag ce na de tsam gyis gnyen po dang / phan yon dang / de gnyi ga'i rten gyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Why are only investigation, etc. established as members, while other dharmas exist? Because the members of antidotes, benefits, and the support of both are completely fulfilled by just those.

original: gzugs med pa dag la ni yan lag rnam par gzhag pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa dag la ni yan lag rnam par gzhag pa med do //
translated: In the formless realms, the members are not established.

original: zhi gnas su ro gcig pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: zhi gnas su ro gcig pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because they are of one taste in calm abiding.

original: 'di skad du gnyen po'i yan lag gi phyir dang / phan yon gyi yan lag gi phyir dang / de gnyi ga'i rten gyi yan lag gi phyir zhes bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad du gnyen po'i yan lag gi phyir dang / phan yon gyi yan lag gi phyir dang / de gnyi ga'i rten gyi yan lag gi phyir zhes bshad pa yin te /
translated: This is what is explained: “Because of the members of antidotes, because of the members of benefits, and because of the members that are the support of both.”

original: re zhig bsam gtan dang po la gnyen po'i yan lag ni rtog pa dang dpyod pa yin te /
analyzed: re zhig bsam gtan dang po la gnyen po'i yan lag ni rtog pa dang dpyod pa yin te /
translated: In the first concentration, the members of antidotes are investigation and analysis.

original: de dag gis 'dod pa'i gnod sems dang / rnam par 'tshe ba spong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gis 'dod pa'i gnod sems dang / rnam par 'tshe ba spong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they abandon malice and violence of the desire realm.

original: phan yon gyi yan lag ni dga' ba dang bde ba yin te /
analyzed: phan yon gyi yan lag ni dga' ba dang bde ba yin te /
translated: The limbs of benefit are joy and pleasure.

original: rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag gis mi mthun pa'i phyogs spangs nas de las dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag gis mi mthun pa'i phyogs spangs nas de las dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: One obtains joy and pleasure born of seclusion, having abandoned the opposing side through investigation and analysis.

original: de gnyi ga'i rten gyi yan lag ni sems rtse gcig pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: de gnyi ga'i rten gyi yan lag ni sems rtse gcig pa nyid yin te /
translated: The limb of support is one-pointedness of mind.

original: rten gyi stobs kyis rtog pa la sogs pa 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rten gyi stobs kyis rtog pa la sogs pa 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because one engages in investigation, etc., through the power of support.

original: de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa la gnyen po'i yan lag ni nang rab tu dang ba yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa la gnyen po'i yan lag ni nang rab tu dang ba yin te /
translated: Similarly, in the second absorption, the limb of countering is inner clarity.

original: des rtog pa dang dpyod pa spong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des rtog pa dang dpyod pa spong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that abandons investigation and analysis.

original: dga' ba dang bde ba dang sems rtse gcig pa nyid ni yan lag lhag ma dag yin te /
analyzed: dga' ba dang bde ba dang sems rtse gcig pa nyid ni yan lag lhag ma dag yin te /
translated: Joy, pleasure, and one-pointedness of mind are the remaining limbs,

original: snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin no //
translated: just as before.

original: bsam gtan gsum pa la gnyen po'i yan lag ni btang snyoms dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin yin te de dag gis dga' ba spong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan gsum pa la gnyen po'i yan lag ni btang snyoms dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin yin te de dag gis dga' ba spong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: In the third absorption, the limb of countering is equanimity, mindfulness, and introspection, because those abandon joy.

original: bde ba dang sems rtse gcig pa nyid ni go rims bzhin du yan lag lhag ma dag yin te snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: bde ba dang sems rtse gcig pa nyid ni go rims bzhin du yan lag lhag ma dag yin te snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The remaining members are respectively pleasure and one-pointedness of mind, as before.

original: bsam gtan bzhi pa la gnyen po'i yan lag ni btang snyoms yongs su dag pa dang / dran pa yongs su dag pa yin te /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi pa la gnyen po'i yan lag ni btang snyoms yongs su dag pa dang / dran pa yongs su dag pa yin te /
translated: In the fourth meditation, the members of counteracting and benefit are respectively pure equanimity and pure mindfulness.

original: de dag gis bsam gtan dag na bde ba spong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gis bsam gtan dag na bde ba spong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of them, one abandons pleasure in the meditations.

original: phan yon gyi yan lag ni bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba yin no //
analyzed: phan yon gyi yan lag ni bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba yin no //
translated: The member of benefit is the feeling that is neither pleasure nor pain.

original: de gnyi ga'i rten gyi yan lag ni sems rtse gcig pa nyid yin no //🔽rab tu dang ba dad pa yin //🔽zhes bya ba ni dad @296a * //
analyzed: de gnyi ga'i rten gyi yan lag ni sems rtse gcig pa nyid yin no // rab tu dang ba dad pa yin // zhes bya ba ni dad @296a * //
translated: The member that is the basis of both is one-pointedness of mind.🔽Faith is clear faith.

original: pa nyid rab tu dang pa yin pas rab tu dang ba dad pa yin no //
analyzed: pa nyid rab tu dang pa yin pas rab tu dang ba dad pa yin no //
translated: Faith itself is clear faith.🔽If it is not a separate substance, how is it established as a mental factor?

original: rdzas gzhan med na ji ltar sems las byung ba nyid du 'grub ces bya ba ni rtog pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdzas gzhan med na ji ltar sems las byung ba nyid du 'grub ces bya ba ni rtog pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: This is the case with investigation and so on.

original: skal ldan khyad par can na re sems la sna tshogs pa yod pa'i phyir sems kyi gnas skabs kyi bye brag kyang sems las 'byung ba yin te /🔽yid kyi brjod pa tshol ba'i gnas skabs ni rtog pa'o //
analyzed: skal ldan khyad par can na re sems la sna tshogs pa yod pa'i phyir sems kyi gnas skabs kyi bye brag kyang sems las 'byung ba yin te / yid kyi brjod pa tshol ba'i gnas skabs ni rtog pa'o //
translated: A certain fortunate one says: Because the mind has various aspects, the specific states of the mind are also mental factors.🔽The state of searching for verbal expression of the mind is conception.

original: yid kyi brjod pa so sor rtog pa'i gnas skabs ni dpyod pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi brjod pa so sor rtog pa'i gnas skabs ni dpyod pa'o //
translated: The state of discerning verbal expression of the mind is discernment.

original: sems kyi gnas skabs dag kun nas slong bar byed pa ni rtog pa'o //
analyzed: sems kyi gnas skabs dag kun nas slong bar byed pa ni rtog pa'o //
translated: The state of motivating the mind is conception.

original: de las gzhan pa'i gnas skabs ni dpyod pa'o zhes zer ro//🔽sems kyi gnas skabs rnam par ma g-yengs pa ni ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i gnas skabs ni dpyod pa'o zhes zer ro// sems kyi gnas skabs rnam par ma g-yengs pa ni ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: The state of the mind other than that is discernment.🔽The undistracted state of the mind is concentration.

original: sems kyi gnas skabs rab tu zhi bar 'byung ba ni nang rab tu dang ba'o //
analyzed: sems kyi gnas skabs rab tu zhi bar 'byung ba ni nang rab tu dang ba'o //
translated: The state of the mind that arises as pacified is internal clarity.

original: bsam gtan dag na yod pa'i bde ba ni yid bde ba yin par mi rung ba nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni bde ba'i tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid du 'dra na yid kyi yin yang ci'i phyir yid bde ba la bde ba zhes mi brjod ce na /
analyzed: bsam gtan dag na yod pa'i bde ba ni yid bde ba yin par mi rung ba nyid kyi zhes bya ba ni bde ba'i tshor ba'i ngo bo nyid du 'dra na yid kyi yin yang ci'i phyir yid bde ba la bde ba zhes mi brjod ce na /
translated: If it is similar to mental satisfaction in being pleasure, why is mental satisfaction not called pleasure?

original: rgyu yod de dga' ba 'di ni nye bar ma zhi ba yin pas de ni sems mnyam par gzhag pa de yang g-yengs pa lta bu dang / khengs pa lta bu dang / dga' ba dang bcas pa dang / gad mo dang bcas pa dang /🔽'phyar ba lta bur rnam par 'jog ste /
analyzed: rgyu yod de dga' ba 'di ni nye bar ma zhi ba yin pas de ni sems mnyam par gzhag pa de yang g-yengs pa lta bu dang / khengs pa lta bu dang / dga' ba dang bcas pa dang / gad mo dang bcas pa dang / 'phyar ba lta bur rnam par 'jog ste /
translated: There is a reason: this joy is not peaceful. It is posited as a mental factor that disturbs the mind, that is, it is like a distraction, like a swelling, like joy, like laughter, and like a swagger.

original: gang gi tshe nye bar zhi bar gyur pa de'i tshe sa gzhan thob na de'i rigs can nyid kyi tshor ba la bde ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi tshe nye bar zhi bar gyur pa de'i tshe sa gzhan thob na de'i rigs can nyid kyi tshor ba la bde ba zhes bya'o //
translated: When it becomes peaceful, then it is called pleasure at the time of obtaining another stage.

original: nyon mongs pa las dben pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni de'i sa pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams las ma grol ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa las dben pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni de'i sa pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams las ma grol ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Because it is not separated from the defilements. This means that it is not liberated from the defilements of its level.

original: nyon mongs pas rnyogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyis rab tu ma dang ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: nyon mongs pas rnyogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyis rab tu ma dang ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Because it is disturbed by the defilements. This means that it is not clear because of the defilements.

original: nyon mongs pa can gyi bde bas kun du rmongs par byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa can gyi bde bas bslad pa'i phyir dran pa dang shes bzhin med do //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can gyi bde bas kun du rmongs par byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa can gyi bde bas bslad pa'i phyir dran pa dang shes bzhin med do //
translated: Because it is confused by defiled pleasure. Because it is defiled by defiled pleasure, it lacks mindfulness and introspection.

original: nyon mongs pas dri ma can du byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni de'i sa pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis dri ma can du byas pa'i phyir btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su rdzogs pa dag med do //
analyzed: nyon mongs pas dri ma can du byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni de'i sa pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyis dri ma can du byas pa'i phyir btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su rdzogs pa dag med do //
translated: Because it is defiled by the defilements. Because it is defiled by the defilements of its level, it lacks equanimity and perfect mindfulness.

original: de gnyis ni dge ba'i sa mang po pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni shin tu sbyangs pa dang btang snyoms dag ni dge ba'i sa mang po pa las byung ba ste /
analyzed: de gnyis ni dge ba'i sa mang po pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni shin tu sbyangs pa dang btang snyoms dag ni dge ba'i sa mang po pa las byung ba ste /
translated: Serenity and equanimity are virtuous mental factors that occur in many contexts.

original: dad dang @296b bag yod shin tu sbyangs //
analyzed: dad dang @296b bag yod shin tu sbyangs //
translated: Faith, vigilance, serenity,

original: btang snyoms ngo tsha shes khrel yod //
analyzed: btang snyoms ngo tsha shes khrel yod //
translated: equanimity, shame, embarrassment,

original: rtsa ba gnyis rnam mi 'tshe dang // brtson 'grus rtag tu dge las 'byung //🔽zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtsa ba gnyis rnam mi 'tshe dang // brtson 'grus rtag tu dge las 'byung // zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: nonviolence, and effort always occur in virtuous minds.

original: yang ci phyogs snga ma ltar na bsam gtan nyon mongs pa can dag la yang de dag yod dam zhe na smras pa med do//
analyzed: yang ci phyogs snga ma ltar na bsam gtan nyon mongs pa can dag la yang de dag yod dam zhe na smras pa med do//
translated: If, as the opponent asserts, serenity and equanimity are not virtuous mental factors that occur in many contexts, then do those two exist in afflicted states of meditative stabilization?🔽They do not.

original: ci'i phyir de skad du ma bshad ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir de skad du ma bshad ce na /
translated: Why are they not mentioned?

original: ma bshad bzhin du 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma bshad bzhin du 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are established without being mentioned.

original: gzhan dag na re dge ba'i sa mang po pa shin tu sbyangs pa dang btang snyoms dag ma smos pa'i phyir de dag yod pa kho na'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag na re dge ba'i sa mang po pa shin tu sbyangs pa dang btang snyoms dag ma smos pa'i phyir de dag yod pa kho na'o zhes zer ro //
translated: Others say: They exist because serenity and equanimity that are virtuous mental factors that occur in many contexts are not mentioned.

original: dbugs dag ces bya ba ni dbugs 'byung ba dang / dbugs rngub pa dag ste gnyis nyid du rab tu bstan pa'i phyir 'dir gnyis kyi tshig tu bstan to //
analyzed: dbugs dag ces bya ba ni dbugs 'byung ba dang / dbugs rngub pa dag ste gnyis nyid du rab tu bstan pa'i phyir 'dir gnyis kyi tshig tu bstan to //
translated: are taught here as a dvandva compound because they are taught as a pair.🔽Others say: It is immovable because it is not moved by investigation, analysis, joy, and pleasure.

original: gzhan dag na re rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang dga' ba dang bde ba dag gis g-yo bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bsam gtan snga ma gsum rtog pa la sogs pas g-yo bar byed de /
analyzed: gzhan dag na re rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang dga' ba dang bde ba dag gis g-yo bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bsam gtan snga ma gsum rtog pa la sogs pas g-yo bar byed de /
translated: The first three meditative stabilizations are moved by investigation and so on.

original: bsam gtan dang po ni rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag gis g-yo la /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po ni rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag gis g-yo la /
translated: The first meditative stabilization is moved by investigation and analysis.

original: gnyis pa ni dga' bas /
analyzed: gnyis pa ni dga' bas /
translated: The second is moved by joy.

original: gsum pa ni bde bas g-yo ba /
analyzed: gsum pa ni bde bas g-yo ba /
translated: The third is moved by pleasure.

original: de ltar bzhi pa ni skyon brgyad dang bral ba'i phyir de dag gis mi g-yo ste /
analyzed: de ltar bzhi pa ni skyon brgyad dang bral ba'i phyir de dag gis mi g-yo ste /
translated: The fourth is not moved by those because it is free of the eight errors.🔽A sutra states:

original: mdo las / dper na rlung med pa'i mar me rlung gis mi g-yo ba de dang 'dra'o zhes gsungs so zhes zer ro//
analyzed: mdo las / dper na rlung med pa'i mar me rlung gis mi g-yo ba de dang 'dra'o zhes gsungs so zhes zer ro//
translated: For example, a lamp unmoved by wind is not moved by wind.

original: dang por gtogs zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang pos bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: dang por gtogs zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang pos bsdus pa yin no //
translated: It is said to belong to the first because it is subsumed by the first absorption.

original: sprul pa'i sems bzhin du zhes bya ba ni sa de pa'i sprul pa sprul par 'dod pa'i sprul pa po gang dag yin pa sa 'og ma'i sprul pa'i sems mngon sum du byed pa de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: sprul pa'i sems bzhin du zhes bya ba ni sa de pa'i sprul pa sprul par 'dod pa'i sprul pa po gang dag yin pa sa 'og ma'i sprul pa'i sems mngon sum du byed pa de dang 'dra'o //
translated: Like the mind of emanation means like those who are emanators who wish to emanate the emanations of that level, who manifest the mind of emanation of a lower level.

original: dman pa'i phyir dge ba yang ma yin no zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i dge ba de ni bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa bas dman zhing tha chad yin pas de'i phyir mngon sum du mi byed de /
analyzed: dman pa'i phyir dge ba yang ma yin no zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa'i dge ba de ni bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa pa bas dman zhing tha chad yin pas de'i phyir mngon sum du mi byed de /
translated: It is not virtuous because it is inferior means that virtuous mind of the first absorption is inferior and inferior to that of the second absorption and so on. Therefore it is not manifested because it is inferior.

original: dgongs pa'i phyir de dag bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa mngon sum du byed kyi gus pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dgongs pa'i phyir de dag bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa mngon sum du byed kyi gus pas ni ma yin no //
translated: They manifest the virtuous mind of the first absorption through intention, but not through respect.

original: dge ba de ni rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa yin na de dag ni de'i rnam par smin pa don du gnyer ba ma yin pas dge ba'i sems mngon du bya ba la 'bad pa mi byed do //🔽'dod chags bral /
analyzed: dge ba de ni rnam par smin pa dang bcas pa yin na de dag ni de'i rnam par smin pa don du gnyer ba ma yin pas dge ba'i sems mngon du bya ba la 'bad pa mi byed do // 'dod chags bral /
translated: If that virtuous mind possesses karmic maturation, they do not strive to manifest virtuous minds because they do not seek its karmic maturation.

original: skye ba las zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang bral bas so //
analyzed: skye ba las zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags dang bral bas so //
translated: From freedom from attachment and from birth means from freedom from attachment to the desire realm level and from birth in the desire realm.

original: skye bas she 'am zhes bya ba'i sgra mi mngon par bstan pa yin te /
analyzed: skye bas she 'am zhes bya ba'i sgra mi mngon par bstan pa yin te /
translated: The term “or” is a presentation of non-manifest speech.

original: de dang mi ldan pa @297a * //
analyzed: de dang mi ldan pa @297a * //
translated: Those who do not possess

original: ni sa 'og ma las 'dod chags dang bral bas bsam gtan nam gzugs med pa dag pa pa 'thob ste /
analyzed: ni sa 'og ma las 'dod chags dang bral bas bsam gtan nam gzugs med pa dag pa pa 'thob ste /
translated: the formless realm obtain it through freedom from attachment to lower levels.

original: 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral bas ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun ba ma gtogs pa dag pa pa dang po rnam pa gsum 'thob la /
analyzed: 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral bas ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun ba ma gtogs pa dag pa pa dang po rnam pa gsum 'thob la /
translated: Those who are free from attachment to the desire realm definitely obtain the first pure absorption that is of three types, excluding the factors conducive to penetrative insight.

original: de bzhin du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las 'dod chags dang bral bas ni srid pa'i rtse mo 'thob pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las 'dod chags dang bral bas ni srid pa'i rtse mo 'thob pa'i bar du'o //
translated: Similarly, those who are free from attachment to the base of nothingness obtain the summit of existence.

original: srid pa'i rtse mo ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba ni de ni sa 'og ma las 'dod chags dang bral ba kho nas 'thob bo //
analyzed: srid pa'i rtse mo ma gtogs pa zhes bya ba ni de ni sa 'og ma las 'dod chags dang bral ba kho nas 'thob bo //
translated: The summit of existence is not obtained through freedom from attachment to lower levels, but is obtained only through freedom from attachment to the same level.

original: sa 'og mar skye ba las zhes bya ba ni gong nas sa 'og mar skye ba na de 'thob bo //
analyzed: sa 'og mar skye ba las zhes bya ba ni gong nas sa 'og mar skye ba na de 'thob bo //
translated: Those who are born in lower levels obtain it through being born in lower levels from higher levels.

original: sbyor ba las kyang nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i zhes bya ba ni de'i 'thob pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba dang skye bas byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sbyor ba las kyang nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i zhes bya ba ni de'i 'thob pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba dang skye bas byas pa ma yin no //
translated: Also, from preparation, one obtains the stage conducive to penetrations, but not through freedom from attachment or through birth.

original: yongs su nyams pa las kyang nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: yongs su nyams pa las kyang nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Also, from complete degeneration, one obtains the stage conducive to degeneration.

original: gnas pa'i cha dang mthun pa las yongs su nyams na nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa 'thob bo//
analyzed: gnas pa'i cha dang mthun pa las yongs su nyams na nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa 'thob bo//
translated: If one degenerates from the stage conducive to abidance, one obtains the stage conducive to degeneration.

original: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir yongs su nyams pas kyang nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa 'thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir yongs su nyams pas kyang nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa 'thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For that reason, because one obtains the stage conducive to degeneration through complete degeneration,

original: de bzhin du yongs su nyams pa dang / skye bas 'thob pa dang 'dor bar 'gyur ba yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du yongs su nyams pa dang / skye bas 'thob pa dang 'dor bar 'gyur ba yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: one should also apply degeneration, obtainment and relinquishment through birth.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How?

original: dag pa pa yongs su nyams pas 'thob la yongs su nyams pas 'dor ba yod dam zhe na /
analyzed: dag pa pa yongs su nyams pas 'thob la yongs su nyams pas 'dor ba yod dam zhe na /
translated: Is there complete degeneration of the pure?

original: yod do // dag pa pa skye bas 'thob la skye bas 'dor ba yod dam zhe na /
analyzed: yod do // dag pa pa skye bas 'thob la skye bas 'dor ba yod dam zhe na /
translated: Is there any pure meditative attainment that is obtained by birth and then lost by birth?

original: smras pa yod do //
analyzed: smras pa yod do //
translated: Yes, there is.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: bsam gtan dang po nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: It is said: the stage that is compatible with degeneration of the first absorption.

original: bsam gtan dang po ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten sa gsum gyi khyad par can te /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten sa gsum gyi khyad par can te /
translated: The first absorption is the special stage of the three Brahma realms.

original: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten skye ba na zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten skye ba na zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is said: One is born in the Brahma realms.

original: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten las 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dor ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten las 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dor ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is lost through freedom from attachment to the Brahma realms.

original: 'di ltar bsam gtan dang po las 'dod chags dang bral bas nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i bsam gtan nyon mongs pa dang mthun pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di ltar bsam gtan dang po las 'dod chags dang bral bas nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i bsam gtan nyon mongs pa dang mthun pa'i phyir /
translated: Thus, it is lost through freedom from attachment to the first absorption because the first absorption is compatible with affliction.

original: de'i sa pa'i nyon mongs pa bzhin du 'dor te /
analyzed: de'i sa pa'i nyon mongs pa bzhin du 'dor te /
translated: It is lost like the affliction of that stage.

original: de'i phyir tshangs pa'i 'jig rten las 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dor ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir tshangs pa'i 'jig rten las 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dor ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Therefore it is said: It is lost through freedom from attachment to the Brahma realms.

original: re zhig dri ba dang po'i lan ni de lta bu yin no //🔽tshangs pa'i 'jig rten las 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams pa las 'thob ces bya ba ni gal te @297b tshangs pa'i 'jig rten las 'dod chags dang bral ba las yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams na yang sa de pa'i nyon mongs pa bzhin

translated: They are distinguished by the experience of taste and so on.🔽Do they have feeling that is similar to that?

original: de dag la tshor ba yang de dang 'dra bar yod dam zhes bya ba ni ci bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa na ni dga' ba yod la /
analyzed: de dag la tshor ba yang de dang 'dra bar yod dam zhes bya ba ni ci bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa na ni dga' ba yod la /
translated: In the first and second absorptions there is joy.

original: gsum pa la ni bde ba /
analyzed: gsum pa la ni bde ba /
translated: The third has pleasure.🔽The fourth has equanimity.

original: bzhi pa la ni btang snyoms zhes bshad pa ltar nyer bsdogs dag la yang de dang 'dra 'am zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: bzhi pa la ni btang snyoms zhes bshad pa ltar nyer bsdogs dag la yang de dang 'dra 'am zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: Are the access concentrations like that?🔽They are associated with the faculty of equanimity because they are the path that arises through exertion.

original: btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa dag kyang yin te 'bad de drang bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'byung ba'i lam ni dga' ba dang bde ba dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin na🔽/ nyer bsdogs de dag ni 'bad de drang dgos pas mngon bar 'du bya ba dang bcas par 'byung ba yin te /
analyzed: btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa dag kyang yin te 'bad de drang bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'du bya ba med par 'byung ba'i lam ni dga' ba dang bde ba dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin na / nyer bsdogs de dag ni 'bad de drang dgos pas mngon bar 'du bya ba dang bcas par 'byung ba yin te /
translated: The path that arises without exertion is associated with joy and pleasure.

original: de'i phyir btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin no //
translated: The access concentrations are associated with the faculty of equanimity because they are the path that arises through exertion.

original: yang sa 'og ma las yid byung ba dang ma bral ba'i phyir dga' ba dang bde ba dag dang mi ldan te /
analyzed: yang sa 'og ma las yid byung ba dang ma bral ba'i phyir dga' ba dang bde ba dag dang mi ldan te /
translated: They are not associated with joy and pleasure because they are not free from the distress of the lower level.

original: de'i phyir yang btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan no //
analyzed: de'i phyir yang btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan no //
translated: They are also associated with the faculty of equanimity because they are not free from the distress of the lower level.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i lam yin pa'i phyir ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i lam yin pa'i phyir ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin no //
translated: They are not associated with relishing because they are the path of separation from attachment.

original: gal te ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan par gyur na /
analyzed: gal te ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan par gyur na /
translated: If they were associated with relishing,

original: 'dod chags dang bral lam yin bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral lam yin bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: they would not be the path of separation from attachment.

original: sred pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i lam gyis ni nyon mongs pa spong bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sred pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i lam gyis ni nyon mongs pa spong bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: For the path that is concomitant with craving does not abandon affliction.

original: yang na 'di ltar sbyar te /
analyzed: yang na 'di ltar sbyar te /
translated: Or else, it is applied in this way:

original: 'bad de drang bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa dag kyang yin la /
analyzed: 'bad de drang bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan pa dag kyang yin la /
translated: They are concomitant with the faculty of equanimity because they are to be drawn out with effort.

original: sa 'og ma las yid byung ba dang ma bral ba'i phyir dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i lam yin pa'i phyir zhes bya bar rgyu gnyis kyis ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: sa 'og ma las yid byung ba dang ma bral ba'i phyir dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i lam yin pa'i phyir zhes bya bar rgyu gnyis kyis ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin no zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: They are not associated with relishing for two reasons: because they are not free from the dispassion of lower levels and because they are the path of separation from attachment.

original: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin du brjod do //
analyzed: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin du brjod do //
translated: The rest is explained as before.

original: nyer bsdogs kyi sems kyis nying mtshams sbyor ba nyon mongs pa can yin mod kyi zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa brgyad car na yang gang gi nyer bsdogs gang yin pa de'i nyer bsdogs kyi sems nyon mongs pa can mnyam par gzhag pa ma🔽yin pa des nying mtshams sbyor ro zhes bya ba 'di ni grub pa'i mtha' yin no //
analyzed: nyer bsdogs kyi sems kyis nying mtshams sbyor ba nyon mongs pa can yin mod kyi zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa brgyad car na yang gang gi nyer bsdogs gang yin pa de'i nyer bsdogs kyi sems nyon mongs pa can mnyam par gzhag pa ma yin pa des nying mtshams sbyor ro zhes bya ba 'di ni grub pa'i mtha' yin no //
translated: This is the tenet that the afflicted mind of access concentration to any of the eight absorptions and formless states is not equipoise.

original: de'i phyir 'di skad du nyer bsdogs kyi sems kyis nying mtshams sbyor ba nyon mongs pa can yin mod kyi zhes bya ba @301a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di skad du nyer bsdogs kyi sems kyis nying mtshams sbyor ba nyon mongs pa can yin mod kyi zhes bya ba @301a * //
translated: Therefore it says, Indeed, the mind of access concentration that links to the absorptions and formless states is afflicted.

original: rgyas par smos so /
analyzed: rgyas par smos so /
translated: This is the extensive explanation.🔽It is also asserted that unrestricted access concentration is concomitant with enjoyment.

original: mi lcogs pa med pa ro myang ba dang mtshungs par yang 'dod do zhes bya ba ni mi lcogs pa med pa ni bsal ba'i phyir ji ltar de zag pa med pa yang srid pa de bzhin du ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang yin no
analyzed: mi lcogs pa med pa ro myang ba dang mtshungs par yang 'dod do zhes bya ba ni mi lcogs pa med pa ni bsal ba'i phyir ji ltar de zag pa med pa yang srid pa de bzhin du ro myang ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang yin no
translated: Since unrestricted access concentration is distinguished, it is like the possibility that it is uncontaminated and it is also concomitant with enjoyment.

original: snyam du bsams pa'o //
analyzed: snyam du bsams pa'o //
translated: This is the thought.

original: slob dpon 'dus bzangs na re dngos gzhi la snyogs pa'i phyir ro myang ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa yod pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
analyzed: slob dpon 'dus bzangs na re dngos gzhi la snyogs pa'i phyir ro myang ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa yod pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
translated: Master Saṅghabhadra says: Because it is the actual basis, it is called special absorption because it is the meditative attainment of enjoyment.

original: bsam gtan gyi khyad par yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang po'i dngos gzhi de nyid rtog pa dang bral bas khyad par du 'phags par gyur ba la bsam gtan khyad par can zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi khyad par yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang po'i dngos gzhi de nyid rtog pa dang bral bas khyad par du 'phags par gyur ba la bsam gtan khyad par can zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Because it is a special meditative stabilization means that the actual basis of the first absorption itself is superior since it is free of investigation. It is called special absorption because it is superior.

original: khyad par med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bsam gtan dang po la khyad par yod de /
analyzed: khyad par med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bsam gtan dang po la khyad par yod de /
translated: Because there is no distinction means that, just as there is a distinction in the first absorption,

original: la lar ni rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag / la lar ni dpyod pa kho na yin pa ltar gnyis pa la sogs pa la ni da lta ma yin pas de'i phyir bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa la bsam gtan khyad par can rnam par mi gzhag
analyzed: la lar ni rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag / la lar ni dpyod pa kho na yin pa ltar gnyis pa la sogs pa la ni da lta ma yin pas de'i phyir bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa la bsam gtan khyad par can rnam par mi gzhag
translated: in some instances it is free of investigation and analysis, in some it is free of analysis alone, but there is no such distinction in the second absorption and so on. Therefore special absorption is not posited for the second absorption and so on.

original: go // de gnyis kyi phyir lam dka' ba yin no zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'du bya ba dang bcas pas drang ba yin pa de nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: go // de gnyis kyi phyir lam dka' ba yin no zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'du bya ba dang bcas pas drang ba yin pa de nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it is drawn with exertion.🔽Because it is drawn with exertion,

original: rtog pa tsam zhig bkag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni /🔽rtog med bsam gtan khyad par can //
analyzed: rtog pa tsam zhig bkag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni / rtog med bsam gtan khyad par can //
